attributes.action: insist that the Royal princes perform a full military career or leave the Army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the two princes seem to have more leave than any other serving soldier or officer,enjoy the privilege of not serving in nasty places!! they should leave the service, and stop playing at being soldiers. You want to lead your country, then serve your country properly, and get amongst those brave men and women of this country doing a proper job every day in Iraq and Afghanistan.
